Subroutine writeloop

949 : 
950 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
951 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
952 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
953 : 
954 : !     * WRITE shufflevar AND ofvec OF LAST LOOP TO FILE AND TERMINATE
955 :       subroutine writeloop ()
956 :       use sce_mod
957 :       implicit none
958 : 
959 :       INTEGER :: i_
960 : 
961 :       open(kfile_lastloop, file=sfile_lastloop(1:len_trim(sfile_lastloop)))
962 :       write(kfile_lastloop,'(i3)') ncomp2
963 :       write(kfile_lastloop,'(i4)') nloop
964 :       write(kfile_lastloop,'(i10)') nrun
965 :       write(kfile_lastloop,'(i10)') nsincebest
966 :       write(kfile_lastloop,loopformat) ofvec(:)
967 :       do i_ = 1, npar
968 :         write(kfile_lastloop,loopformat) shufflevar(i_,:)
969 :       enddo
970 :       close(kfile_lastloop)
971 : 
972 :       return
973 :       end subroutine writeloop
